name: Guiding Light
wikiSummary: According to the Guiding Light Songfacts , lyrically this power ballad is influenced by the love story between Winston Smith and Julia in George Orwell's novel about a future repressive totalitarian regime, 1984.
wikiText: According to the Guiding Light Songfacts , lyrically this power ballad is influenced by the love story between Winston Smith and Julia in George Orwell's novel about a future repressive totalitarian regime, 1984.
